snippet: Jiyai Shin of South Korea held a five-stroke lead after 36 holes of the Women’s British Open in Hoylake, England.
abstract: Jiyai Shin of South Korea takes second-round lead at the Women’s British Open golf tournament in Hoylake, England.
lead_paragraph: Jiyai Shin of South Korea held a five-stroke lead after 36 holes of the Women’s British Open in Hoylake, England.

headline.seo: Shin Shoots Brilliant 64 at Women’s British Open
headline.main: In Britain, One Player Blows Away the Field
headline.print_headline: In Britain, One Player Blows Away The Field
